{"id":392038174,"lang":"cpp","time":"11Â months","timestamp":1599435018,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"96 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/392038174/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"21.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n\t\tstd::sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n\t\tstd::vector<std::vector<int>> vecAns;\n\t\tfor (auto t = 0 ; t < nums.size();++t){\n\t\t\tif (t > 0 && nums[t] == nums[t-1]) continue;\n\t\t\tauto l = t+1; \n\t\t\tauto r = nums.size()-1;\n\t\t\twhile ( l < r ){\n\t\t\t\tauto threeSum = nums[l] + nums[r] + nums[t];\n                if (l> t+1 && nums[l] == nums[l-1] ){\n                    ++l ;\n                    continue;\n                };\n\t\t\t\tif (threeSum == 0){\n\t\t\t\t\tstd::vector<int> vecTriplet{nums[l],nums[r],nums[t]};\n\t\t\t\t\tvecAns.push_back(vecTriplet);\n                    ++l;\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\telse if(threeSum < 0){\n                    ++l;\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\telse\n\t\t\t\t{\n                    --r;\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t}\n\t\treturn vecAns;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
